Valverde Terapkan Formasi 1-2-1-6 Lawan Slavia Praha, Barcelona jadi Guyonan
06 Nov 2019, 13:13 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Hasil imbang tanpa gol yang didapatkan Barcelona ketika menghadapi Slavia Praha mendapatkan banyak tanggapan dari banyak pihak. Salah satu yang menarik adalah momen ketika pelatih Ernesto Valverde memainkan formasi 1-2-1-6 di atas lapangan.
Seperti dilansir Sportbible, formasi super menyerang tersebut dipakai Barcelona pada babak pertama. Full back Nelson Semedo dan Jordi Alba, dipasang di posisi samping.
Gelandang Barcelona Arturo Vidal, yang kerap bermain sebagai gelandang bertahan, bahkan sempat ditempatkan sebagai pemain nomor 10 dalam waktu singkat.
Namun, taktik tersebut tak berjalan sesuai rencana. Meskipun terus menyerang, Barcelona sulit mencetak gol. Faktanya, Barca malah beberapa kali terancam oleh serang balik Slavia Praha.
Tim lawan malah menemukan banyak ruang kosong di lini tengah karena Sergio Busquets, Frenkie De Jong, dan Arturo Vidal, kesulitan kembali ke belakang saat mendapat serangan balik.
Hingga pertandingan usai, skor 0-0 tetap bertahan. Alhasil, Barcelona langsung menjadi bulan-bulan di media sosial, terutama terkait pemilihan taktik aneh oleh Valverde. Berikut 11 di antara olok-olokan yang ditujukan terhadap Barcelona.

Valverde Apply Formation 1-2-1-6 Against Slavic Prague, Barcelona becomes a Joke
Nov 6 2019, 13:13 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona's goalless draw when faced with Slavia Prague received many responses from many parties. One of the highlights was the moment when coach Ernesto Valverde played a 1-2-1-6 formation on the field.
As reported by Sportbible, the super attacking formation was used by Barcelona in the first round. Full back Nelson Semedo and Jordi Alba, installed in the side position.
Barcelona midfielder Arturo Vidal, who often plays as a defensive midfielder, was even placed as number 10 player in a short time.
However, these tactics did not go according to plan. Despite continuing to attack, Barcelona is difficult to score goals. In fact, Barca was threatened several times by the Slavic counterattack of Prague.
The opposing team instead found plenty of empty space in midfield because Sergio Busquets, Frenkie De Jong, and Arturo Vidal, struggled to get back when they came back.
Until the match was over, the score 0-0 remained. As a result, Barcelona immediately became months in social media, especially related to the selection of strange tactics by Valverde. Here are 11 of the banters aimed at Barcelona.
